markdownRemark.html:
“Mendicants, there are these four factors of stream-entry. What four? Associating with good people, listening to the true teaching, proper attention, and practicing in line with the teaching. These are the four factors of stream-entry.”

SN.55.51. Sagāthakasutta (“With Verses”)

children.value:
“Mendicants, there are these four factors of stream-entry.
What four?
Associating with good people, listening to the true teaching, proper attention, and practicing in line with the teaching.
These are the four factors of stream-entry.”
